trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contiene gli argomenti associati alle modifiche a un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: Gli eventi associati supportati da questo delegato forniti dalla <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>classe e includere <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"> </xref> (classe), richiede un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> come valori iniziali per la classe.

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Il dispositivo di input associato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object associated with this event.
Gets control text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo testo associato a un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il testo del controllo associato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Richiama i gestori eventi in modo specifico del tipo, che può aumentare l'efficienza del sistema di eventi.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione esegue il cast del gestore generico come un <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>e quindi richiama tale</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su questo modello di implementazione e per i motivi, vedere <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>e [indirizzato Cenni preliminari sugli eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore generico da chiamare in modo specifico del tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione di chiamare il gestore.

trans-unit.source: Gets system text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo di sistema associato a un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il testo del sistema associato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo associato di input un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il testo di input associato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> associata a un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> oggetto che contiene la composizione di testo associata a questo evento.
